# emailAddresses

**Instance Property**

An array of labeled email addresses for the contact.

## Declaration

```swift
var emailAddresses: [CNLabeledValue<NSString>] { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is an array of [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNLabeledValue] objects, each of which has a label and a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] value.

## Setting Addresses

- **postalAddresses**: An array of labeled postal addresses for a contact.
- **urlAddresses**: An array of labeled URL addresses for a contact.
